column3: str

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander desires knowings of Rival Wings? Softknox makes uplander's braincase wet from many tongueflaps!
What do you wish to know about Rival Wings?
What is Rival Wings?
What are the rules?
What are the rewards?
Nothing.
Which rules will you ask about?
Cores.
Towers.
Power generator.
Machina.
Ceruleum.
Mammets.
Soaring.
Nothing.
Uplanders fight each other with mighty machina of gobmake. Make much mayhem and turn core of enemy into bitty-bits!
Rival Wings is a large-scale PvP battle involving up to 48 combatants. Participants are divided into two teams, the Falcons and the Ravens.
Each team is given a core to protect, and the side that destroys the opponent's core is declared the winner.
Should time run out before a core is destroyed, victory is awarded to the team that dealt the most damage to the core and its protective towers.
Core is thumping heart of battle. A winner is team that makes core of enemy become bitty-bits.
Each team has a core located at its base, and the chief objective is to destroy the enemy's core.
The core is protected by a magitek field emanating from two towers.
As such, before you can strike at the core, you must first destroy the towers and deactivate the magitek field.
Towers keep core awayharm. If towers upstand, uplander cannot strikesmash core. Uplanders must downbring towers first!
Each team has two towers that serve to protect the core.
Each tower, meanwhile, is enveloped in a magitek field that mitigates damage taken by team members.
When hard-pressed, your towers can provide you with much-needed respite. Be sure to take advantage of their protection.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander who takeholds power generator takeholds ceruleum! Ceruleum lifeblood of planstrike!
A power generator is located at the center of the map. Combatants can take control of the generator by interacting with it.
While the generator is under a team's control, the stores of ceruleum for all of its alliances will gradually replenish.
As more ceruleum means more opportunities to deploy machina, the power generator's strategic value cannot be overstated.
Gobbies crafty-make special machina for Rival Wings. Machina to help uplanders crunch much bone and smash much steel!
Powerful machina can be deployed and ridden into battle.
There exist three types: the Cruise Chaser, effective against combatants; the Oppressor, devastating against structures; and Brute Justice, the great equalizer.
While machina offer many advantages, ceruleum is required to activate them.
Once your team has sufficient ceruleum, you can choose a machina to deploy at the hangar terminal, located near the starting area.
Only one machina may be operated per party at any given time, regardless of type.
In the case of the Oppressor, however, the limit is two per team.
A Brute Justice becomes available to a team for each tower it loses.
You can simultaneously operate as many Brute Justices as the number of towers you have lost.
Machina are mighty and can smite muchly, yes, but they need fuel. Uplander must be collecting ceruleum first.
Ceruleum is required to operate machina. A maximum of 100 units of ceruleum can be stored by each party.
You can build up your ceruleum stores by collecting tanks in the field, controlling the power generator, or defeating enemy team members and mammets.
As ceruleum is a party resource, it is recommended that you confer with your comrades prior to activating a machina.
Trusty mammets fight for each team. March on tower and core, and kaboom! Massive damage!
Mammets are clockwork soldiers programmed to seek out and destroy towers and cores.
They emerge from their own core at regular intervals before striking out on a set route, and will remain in battle for a set duration.
Upon detecting an enemy mammet, they will engage and attack until either side is destroyed.
Mammets that arrive at an enemy tower or core will perform a powerful self-sacrificing attack.
That is the extent of their programming; mammets will not harm adventurers.

If uplander downstrikes enemy, spirit of comrades soars! <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Soaring<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> spirit makes for easier downstriking!
When you defeat an enemy team member, your party receives the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Soaring<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect.
The effect increases damage dealt as well as HP restored, and can stack up to twenty times.

At twenty stacks, Soaring will be replaced with the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Flying High<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect, which confers even greater benefits.
Soaring fluctuates by party, increasing when a party member defeats an enemy team member or destroys a tower.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Big questprize awaits winners, so fight well and strikesmash muchly!

Participating in Rival Wings will earn you <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>experience points<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>PvP EXP<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Wolf Marks<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, with a larger amount being awarded to the victors.
You will also receive <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Allagan tomestones<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> at the end of each match.
